message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

This paper deals with the problem of video description, which involves understanding both visual and linguistic information. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV), Natural Language Processing (cs.CL), and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper proposes a novel model for generating grounded captions, which involves linking language to visual evidence, making it relevant to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the paper also applies the proposed model to image description, which falls under the Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
